hotels.name: HÃ´tel Palafitte
hotels.desc: Europe's only overwater hotel, suspended pavilions, lake access, 5-star luxury
hotels.longDesc: Europe's only overwater hotel features pavilions suspended above Lake NeuchÃ¢tel with direct water access and stunning views. Originally built for Expo 2002, it has become a unique luxury destination.

hotels.name: AMERON Luzern
hotels.desc: 4-star lakeside hotel, Alpine views, Lake Lucerne setting, luxury getaway
hotels.longDesc: A luxurious 4-star hotel nestled between Lake Lucerne and the Alps, offering a premium alpine retreat with stunning natural surroundings and modern amenities.

hotels.name: 84 Club Chalets
hotels.desc: Alpine chalet accommodations, Rougemont location, exclusive club access
hotels.longDesc: A curated chalet collection offering luxury alpine stays in the picturesque Rougemont village, combining Swiss hospitality with exclusive club amenities for discerning travelers.

hotels.name: Gstaad Palace
hotels.desc: Iconic alpine palace hotel, year-round luxury destination, Swiss Alps elegance
hotels.longDesc: A legendary Swiss alpine palace hotel renowned for its impeccable service, world-class amenities, and stunning mountain backdrop. A perennial favorite for discerning travelers seeking alpine sophistication.

hotels.name: The Brecon
hotels.desc: 18-room alpine retreat, century-old chalet, Mid-Century design, ski village hideaway
hotels.longDesc: A transformed century-old chalet in Swiss Adelboden featuring 18 rooms with homely interiors and Mid-Century design moments, eschewing traditional ski lodge clichÃ©s for a refined mountain escape.

hotels.name: Badrutt's Palace
hotels.desc: Legendary alpine palace hotel, winter sports hub, fine dining, Swiss Alps luxury
hotels.longDesc: An iconic Swiss alpine palace hotel in St. Moritz, world-renowned for luxury accommodations, championship skiing, and sophisticated mountain hospitality since 1896.

hotels.name: Mont Cervin Palace
hotels.desc: Luxury alpine resort, Matterhorn views, 5-star mountain hospitality, Zermatt
hotels.longDesc: An exclusive luxury hotel in Zermatt offering stunning Matterhorn views, world-class alpine skiing, and refined mountain elegance in the heart of the Swiss Alps.

hotels.name: Edenroc Ascona
hotels.desc: Vibrant boutique hotel on main promenade, designer Carlo Rampazzi's colorful aesthetic, lakeside charm
hotels.longDesc: A recently renovated boutique hotel positioned on Ascona's main promenade, featuring a fresh new look by celebrated local designer Carlo Rampazzi, known for his joyful and colorful style.

hotels.name: Castello del Sole
hotels.desc: Ultra-luxury resort on sprawling estate with vineyards, spa, culinary excellence, lake views
hotels.longDesc: An ultra-luxurious resort set on a sprawling 346-acre estate featuring private vineyards, a world-class spa, exceptional dining experiences, and direct lake access overlooking Lago Maggiore.
hotels.photoAttribution: Castello del Sole Beach Resort & SPA

hotels.name: Chesa Marchetta
hotels.desc: Artfarm's Swiss debut blending art, crafts, Alpine luxury, aged cheese
hotels.longDesc: A sophisticated mountain hotel created by Iwan and Manuela Wirth, seamlessly merging contemporary art with curated global craftsmanship and regional culinary traditions in the heart of Engadin.
hotels.address: Via da Marias 88, 7514 Sils im Engadin, Switzerland

hotels.name: Vecchia Dogana
hotels.desc: Swiss luxury hotel, Ticino elegance, exclusive collection
hotels.longDesc: A refined luxury hotel in Ticino, Switzerland, combining Alpine beauty with sophisticated accommodations for the most discerning travelers.

hotels.longDesc: A luxury Alpine hotel in GraubÃ¼nden, Switzerland, nestled in pristine mountain landscapes offering exceptional hospitality and exclusive experiences.

hotels.longDesc: An exclusive luxury hotel in the prestigious Gstaad mountain village, offering refined accommodations, spa facilities, and elegant dining experiences.

hotels.name: Room 18 Zermatt
hotels.desc: Boutique alpine hotel, intimate design, mountain village location
hotels.longDesc: A charming boutique hotel in Zermatt offering intimate accommodations with contemporary design and convenient access to alpine activities.

hotels.name: Eriro Alpine Hide

hotels.longDesc: An exclusive alpine retreat nestled in the mountains offering sauna experiences and wellness activities amid stunning mountain landscapes.

hotels.name: Suvretta House
hotels.desc: Iconic St. Moritz alpine resort, luxury Swiss hospitality, mountain grandeur
hotels.longDesc: A legendary Swiss alpine resort in St. Moritz offering classic luxury, stunning mountain vistas, and world-renowned winter amenities.

hotels.name: Ultima Collection Crans Montana
hotels.desc: Luxury Swiss alpine resort, Crans-Montana elegance, winter grandeur
hotels.longDesc: A premier luxury alpine resort in Crans-Montana offering Swiss sophistication, stunning mountain panoramas, and exceptional winter experiences.
hotels.address: Chem. de la Digue 15, 3963 Lens, Switzerland

hotels.name: Six Senses Crans-Montana
hotels.desc: Luxury alpine resort, spa treatments, high-altitude mountain escape
hotels.longDesc: A prestigious high-altitude luxury resort in the Swiss Alps offering world-class spa experiences, stunning glacier views, and the perfect refuge from summer heat.

hotels.name: Victoria Jungfrau

hotels.longDesc: A prestigious luxury hotel in the Swiss Alps featuring an exceptional kids' club designed to provide continental elegance and curated experiences for young travelers alongside their parents.

experiences.name: Geneva Airport
experiences.desc: Major international airport, gateway to Alpine region
experiences.longDesc: Switzerland's primary international hub serving the Geneva region and Alpine destinations across France, Italy, and Switzerland.

experiences.name: Lauterbrunnen
experiences.desc: Alpine valley town, dramatic cliffs, pristine Swiss mountain scenery
experiences.longDesc: An iconic Swiss alpine village nestled in a stunning valley surrounded by sheer cliffs and waterfalls, offering breathtaking mountain vistas and outdoor adventure opportunities.

experiences.name: Glacier Express
experiences.desc: Iconic 8-hour alpine train journey, 291 bridges, 91 tunnels, gourmet dining
experiences.longDesc: A legendary Swiss rail experience connecting St. Moritz to Zermatt through the heart of the Alps, featuring a three-course meal, panoramic windows, and an unforgettable passage through hundreds of bridges and tunnels.

experiences.name: St. Moritz
experiences.desc: Legendary Swiss alpine resort town, luxury destination, winter sports hub
experiences.longDesc: A world-renowned alpine resort in the Swiss Engadin valley, famous for its glamorous heritage, exceptional winter sports, and stunning mountain scenery.

experiences.name: Zermatt
experiences.desc: Iconic alpine village, car-free mountain town, Matterhorn gateway, stunning views
experiences.longDesc: A charming, car-free Swiss village nestled at the foot of the Matterhorn, offering world-class hiking, skiing, and breathtaking alpine scenery.

experiences.name: Hot Tug Boot Buochs
experiences.desc: Heated boat experience on Lake Lucerne, fondue dining, alpine scenery, autumn and winter seasons
experiences.longDesc: A unique wellness boat featuring 38Â°C heated water where guests can relax while enjoying stunning Alpine views and optional fondue meals on Lake Lucerne during colder months.
experiences.photoAttribution: Pirate Bay Nautical Center + Hot Tub Boat (HotTug)

experiences.name: Lake Lucerne
experiences.desc: Alpine lake with scenic mountain views, water-based activities, popular for wellness and recreational experiences
experiences.longDesc: A pristine alpine lake surrounded by dramatic mountain scenery, offering visitors a serene backdrop for water activities and wellness experiences throughout the seasons.

experiences.name: Preda-Bergun Toboggan Run
experiences.desc: 6km thrilling toboggan run through Alpine landscapes, viaducts, scenic descent
experiences.longDesc: A thrilling 6km sledding run through stunning Swiss Alpine landscapes, gliding under beautiful viaducts from Preda to Bergun. A must-do winter activity combining adventure with panoramic mountain views.

experiences.name: Preda Train Station
experiences.desc: Alpine train station, gateway to Preda-Bergun toboggan run, sled rental hub
experiences.longDesc: The scenic Preda train station serves as the primary access point and trailhead for the famous Preda-Bergun toboggan run, with convenient sled rental facilities on-site.

experiences.name: Bergun
experiences.desc: Alpine village, endpoint of famous Preda-Bergun toboggan run
experiences.longDesc: Charming Alpine village in GraubÃ¼nden that serves as the scenic endpoint of the thrilling Preda-Bergun toboggan descent, nestled in stunning mountain terrain.

experiences.name: Fronalpstock
experiences.desc: Famous Swiss ridge hike, stunning views, scalable difficulty, family-friendly options
experiences.longDesc: One of Switzerland's most celebrated ridge hikes offering spectacular views at every step with flexible difficulty options, from easy family walks to challenging alpine adventures.

experiences.name: Stoos Funicular Railway
experiences.desc: World's steepest funicular railway, unique alpine adventure, gateway to Fronalpstock hike
experiences.longDesc: The world's steepest funicular railroad provides a thrilling ascent from Schwyz to Stoos, offering an adventure in itself while providing access to the renowned Fronalpstock ridge hiking trail.

experiences.name: Chlingenstock
experiences.desc: Alpine hiking landmark, starting point for Fronalpstock easy variant, scenic ridge hiking
experiences.longDesc: A key alpine waypoint on the Fronalpstock hiking network, serving as the starting point for the easier 4.5km ridge hike variant offering accessible access to spectacular mountain views.

experiences.name: Interlaken
experiences.desc: Alpine village nestled between lakes, autumn foliage, mountain vistas, outdoor gateway
experiences.longDesc: Interlaken is a renowned alpine destination in the Swiss Bernese Oberland, offering stunning autumn scenery with crisp air, clear mountain views, and vibrant fall foliage that attracts travelers seeking natural beauty and outdoor experiences.

experiences.name: Bernese Oberland
experiences.desc: UNESCO region, alpine peaks, scenic valleys, hiking and outdoor adventure destination
experiences.longDesc: The Bernese Oberland is a spectacular mountainous region in central Switzerland known for its dramatic alpine peaks, pristine valleys, and world-class outdoor recreation opportunities throughout the seasons.

experiences.name: Ascona
experiences.desc: Charming Swiss lakeside town with Italian flair, Film Festival proximity, elegant promenade
experiences.longDesc: A picturesque lakeside town in Switzerland's Italian-speaking Ticino region, just 90 minutes from Milan, offering cultural charm and proximity to the prestigious Locarno Film Festival.

experiences.name: Locarno Film Festival
experiences.desc: Prestigious international film festival on Lake Maggiore, annual August event, cinematic celebration
experiences.longDesc: A renowned international film festival held annually in August on the shores of Lake Maggiore, bringing world cinema and cultural prestige to the picturesque Ticino region.

experiences.name: Lake Maggiore
experiences.desc: Stunning alpine lake bordering Switzerland and Italy, Film Festival location, scenic retreats
experiences.longDesc: A spectacular alpine lake straddling Switzerland and Italy, providing the stunning backdrop for Ascona and the prestigious Locarno Film Festival with pristine natural beauty.

experiences.name: Lake Geneva
experiences.desc: Iconic Swiss lake, Via Alpina 1 starting point, alpine scenery
experiences.longDesc: A stunning alpine lake where the Via Alpina 1 trail begins, offering pristine waters framed by dramatic mountain peaks and the charming town of Montreux.

experiences.name: Liechtenstein
experiences.desc: World's smallest country, Via Alpina 1 endpoint, alpine destination
experiences.longDesc: The world's smallest country and the destination endpoint of the Via Alpina 1 trail, offering pristine mountain landscapes and unique travel experiences.

experiences.name: Ultima Promenade Gstaad
experiences.desc: Luxury shopping promenade, designer boutiques, upscale dining
experiences.longDesc: An upscale shopping and dining promenade in Gstaad featuring luxury brands and refined establishments in the heart of the prestigious Alpine village.

experiences.name: Alpine train routes in Switzerland
experiences.desc: High Alpine crossings, panoramic views, historic trade routes, glacier vistas, engineering marvel
experiences.longDesc: Experience dramatic Alpine landscapes from specially designed observation decks on scenic Swiss rail lines that cross mountain passes and frame glaciers at their most spectacular.

experiences.name: Vals Bathhouse
experiences.desc: Iconic Alpine bathhouse with renowned architecture and thermal waters
experiences.longDesc: A celebrated thermal bathhouse in the Swiss Alps, famous for its distinctive architecture and serene thermal water experiences set in a stunning mountain landscape.

experiences.name: MÃ¼rren-Gimmelwald
experiences.desc: Alpine cable car and scenic mountain village access, family activities and playground
experiences.longDesc: A mountain destination offering cable car access to the picturesque villages of MÃ¼rren and Gimmelwald, featuring family-approved playgrounds and alpine adventure activities.

experiences.name: Jungfrau Eiger Night Sledging Run
experiences.desc: 3.5 km night sledging run, Alpiglen to Brandegg, Friday and Saturday
experiences.longDesc: An exhilarating nocturnal sledging experience on the Eiger run, open Friday and Saturday nights, offering an unforgettable way to experience the Swiss Alps after dark.

experiences.name: Brissago Islands
experiences.desc: Botanical garden islands in Lake Maggiore accessible by boat from Ascona

kidFriendly.name: Bort Alpine Playground
kidFriendly.desc: Mountain playground with alpine views, family-friendly equipment, accessible by hiking or cable car
kidFriendly.longDesc: A scenic alpine playground nestled in Grindelwald offering children interactive outdoor play equipment with stunning mountain backdrops and fresh alpine air.

kidFriendly.name: Alpine Herdsman's Playground
kidFriendly.desc: Traditional alpine-themed playground with herdsman heritage, mountain activities, family adventure destination
kidFriendly.longDesc: An authentic alpine playground celebrating traditional Swiss herdsman culture with interactive equipment and spectacular mountain panoramas in the heart of the Swiss Alps.

kidFriendly.name: Flower Park
kidFriendly.desc: Alpine flower garden and family park, botanical displays, scenic mountain setting, kid-friendly attractions
kidFriendly.longDesc: A delightful flower park in car-free MÃ¼rren featuring seasonal alpine blooms, family-friendly activities, and panoramic views of the Bernese Oberland peaks.

kidFriendly.name: Staubbach Falls Playground
kidFriendly.desc: Family playground near famous waterfall, scenic alpine setting, children's activities with natural backdrop
kidFriendly.longDesc: A charming family playground situated near the iconic Staubbach Falls, offering children outdoor play equipment surrounded by one of Switzerland's most spectacular natural waterfall displays.

a.name: Alpine Grandeur: Swiss Peaks & Lakes (9 Days)
a.description: Experience the iconic heart of Switzerland through legendary mountain villages, pristine alpine lakes, and the world's most scenic train journeysâ€”from Interlaken's dramatic peaks to St. Moritz's glamorous slopes.
